meanings.definition: A piece or portion of something
meanings.sent1: She cut a parti of the cake to share with her friends.
meanings.sent2: The puzzle was missing a parti, making it challenging to complete.

meanings.definition: To divide into parts or shares
meanings.sent1: They decided to parti the profits equally among the team members.
